Uses of Package
org.gearvrf

  • Packages that use org.gearvrf 
    Package Description
    org.gearvrf
    You need to understand key points of this package to create a GVRF application.
    org.gearvrf.animation
    GVRF animations, version 2.0.
    org.gearvrf.asynchronous
    Implementation of asynch resource loading.
    org.gearvrf.debug
    Miscellaneous debugging utilities.
    org.gearvrf.periodic
    Schedule Runnables to run on the GL thread, in the future.
    org.gearvrf.scene_objects
    Specialized scene objects
  • Classes in org.gearvrf used by org.gearvrf 
    Class and Description
    GVRActivity
    The typical GVRF application will have a single Android Activity, which must descend from GVRActivity, not directly from Activity.
    GVRAndroidResource
    A class to minimize overload fan-out.
    GVRAndroidResource.BitmapTextureCallback
    Callback for asynchronous bitmap-texture loads.
    GVRAndroidResource.Callback
    Callback interface for asynchronous resource loading.
    GVRAndroidResource.CancelableCallback
    Callback interface for cancelable resource loading.
    GVRAndroidResource.CompressedTextureCallback
    Callback for asynchronous compressed-texture loads.
    GVRAndroidResource.MeshCallback
    Callback for asynchronous mesh loads
    GVRAndroidResource.TextureCallback
    Callback for asynchronous texture loads.
    GVRBaseShaderManager 
    GVRBitmapTexture
    Bitmap-based texture.
    GVRCamera
    A GVR camera 'takes a picture' of the scene graph: there are typically two of them, one for each eye.
    GVRCameraRig
    Holds the GVRCameras.
    GVRContext
    Like the Android Context class, GVRContext provides core services, and global information about an application environment.
    GVRCubemapTexture
    Cube map texture.
    GVRCustomMaterialShaderId
    Opaque type that specifies a custom material shader.
    GVRCustomPostEffectShaderId
    Opaque type that specifies a custom post-effect shader.
    GVRDrawFrameListener
    Implement this interface to create a callback that's called once per frame.
    GVREyePointee
    Super class of GVRMeshEyePointee.
    GVREyePointeeHolder
    Holds any number of 'eye pointees,' which are things the eye is pointing at.
    GVRHybridObject
    Root of the GVRF object hierarchy.
    GVRMaterial
    This is one of the key GVRF classes: it holds shaders with textures.
    GVRMaterialMap
    Name map for material shaders.
    GVRMaterialShaderId
    Opaque type that specifies a material shader.
    GVRMaterialShaderManager
    Manages custom shaders, for rendering scene objects.
    GVRMesh
    This is one of the key GVRF classes: It holds GL meshes.
    GVRPicker.GVRPickedObject
    The result of a findObjects() call.
    GVRPostEffect
    A "post effect" shader is a GL shader which can be inserted into the pipeline between rendering the scene graph and applying lens distortion.
    GVRPostEffectMap
    Name map for post effect shaders.
    GVRPostEffectShaderId
    Opaque type that specifies an post effect shader.
    GVRPostEffectShaderManager
    Manages post-effect shaders, for modifying the texture holding the rendered scene graph, before lens distortion is applied.
    GVRRenderData
    One of the key GVRF classes: Encapsulates the data associated with rendering a mesh.
    GVRScene
    The scene graph
    GVRSceneObject
    One of the key GVRF classes: a scene object.
    GVRScreenshot3DCallback
    Callback interface for asynchronous 3D screenshot capture.
    GVRScreenshotCallback
    Callback interface for asynchronous screenshot capture.
    GVRScript
    Extend this class to create a GVRF application.
    GVRScript.SplashMode
    Whether the splash screen should be displayed, and for how long.
    GVRShaderManagers
    The API shared by GVRMaterialShaderManager and GVRPostEffectShaderManager.
    GVRShaderMaps
    The API shared by GVRMaterialMap and GVRPostEffectMap.
    GVRShaders
    The API shared by GVRMaterial and GVRPostEffect.
    GVRTexture
    Wrapper for a GL texture.
    GVRTransform
    One of the key GVRF classes: Encapsulates a 4x4 matrix that controls how GL draws a mesh.
  • Classes in org.gearvrf used by org.gearvrf.animation 
    Class and Description
    GVRContext
    Like the Android Context class, GVRContext provides core services, and global information about an application environment.
    GVRMaterial
    This is one of the key GVRF classes: it holds shaders with textures.
    GVRSceneObject
    One of the key GVRF classes: a scene object.
    GVRTransform
    One of the key GVRF classes: Encapsulates a 4x4 matrix that controls how GL draws a mesh.
